items.text: bit closer to the off stump and he punches it down to long-on
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: there's a long-off in place but Guptill sees this fullish delivery outside off and tees off with a big swing using is muscles to clear the fielder easily
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Guptill, SIX runs

items.text: lets the ball turn in a bit and helps it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Guptill, no run

items.text: turning in again, worked down to long-on
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: tossed up, he rolls his wrists over this one for a single to long-on
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: just outside off and pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, no run

items.text: takes a step across and flicks the low and dipping full toss on leg to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: some turn there towards middle and leg, thick inside edge towards square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, no run

items.text: on middle and leg again, worked off the middle to midwicket this time
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, no run

items.text: plants his front foot down and goes for a big sweep but it goes down the leg side past the pads. And the umpire says it's byes. No idea why that's not a wide if it didn't touch anything
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, 1 bye

items.text: stays in the crease and defends the ball to leg after the turn
items.postText: Frase: "Gotta say it - Guptill is a total legend. One of the best cricketers to watch (especially with straight drives), has scored some of the biggest ODI runs in history, and has the numbers to back it up. Have always been bemused by IPL teams not taking him on." Could be something to do with his T20I record in Asia: 21 innings, 431 runs, strike rate of 113, only one half-century, average 20.50
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, no run

items.text: shaping away from outside off, scythes it towards deep cover for one
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: nips in a little after pitching well outside off, he watches it go to the keeper
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williamson, no run

items.preText: Shan: "Playing the BPL days before this tour isn't ideal preparation considering that most of the players are used to the conditions back home, but you'd really think that the other seniors would turn up with or without Shakib. The only bright spots have been Mithun and Mustafizur."
items.text: this one is pitched closer to off and Williamson carefully defends it to off
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williamson, no run

items.text: swing and a miss outside off as Saifuddin swings this one late, almost after it's crossed the batsman. Williamson tried to cut it off the back foot and missed
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williamson, no run

items.text: closer to the off stump again and he taps it towards point for one
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: 132kmh, innocuous-looking delivery around off and Guptill chips it over the bowler's head almost as a late adjustment and hits it straight enough to stay clear of any fielder and gets four
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Guptill, FOUR runs

items.text: no turn outside off, he punches it to cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, no run

items.text: there was probably a run-out chance as Williamson tucked the ball to midwicket but the fielder ran over the ball and couldn't collect it. That also brings up the partnership 100
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, 2 runs

items.text: turning in and it's worked to deep midwicket again
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: goes for the big sweep on the leg side, the ball lobs off the front pad as it was much slower than Guptill though
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, no run

items.text: he connects this time, the ball has gone pretty high for fine leg to run to his left and try and get his hands to it but it lands just wide of him and beats him to the boundary
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, FOUR runs

items.text: turns in a bit from outside off, tapped to short third man for one
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: attempted yorker on the toes, flicked away into the deep for one
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: towards middle and leg, he defends it carefully to leg
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williamson, no run
